name: Jumpy Goats
description:
Jump the oncoming chickens with the fun new app Jumpy Goats!
This game is a real test for the reflexes as it get faster and faster.
Each level has a different configuration of Jumpy Goats, which can really test your brains ability to quickly adjust itself.
Three lives per game !

Technically it is entirely possible to complete the game but so far no one has.
Be the first!
